abstract.p: CURRENTS: PHOTOGRAPHY: Say Cheese, Cheese, Cheese**Image Technology offers point-and-shoot camera that takes 3-D pictures; photo (Currents column) (S)

block.p: Forget those old cardboard glasses with one red lens and one green one. A $45 point-and-shoot camera with three lenses takes 3-D photos that actually work, without the glasses. It has a built-in flash and uses 35-millimeter color film that must be sent to a special laboratory in California for processing ($1 a print, when you send in 12 exposures).
For the best 3-D results, Image Technology, the manufacturer, advises plenty of foliage or interesting objects in the background and foreground. At Mxyplyzyk, 125 Greenwich Avenue (13th Street).
